author: The Virginian-Pilot
title: All-Tidewater 2014 | Field hockey
text:
These athletes were selected by The Virginian-Pilot staff in consultation with coaches.
ALL-TIDEWATER PLAYER OF THE YEAR | HALEY SCHLEICHER
First Colonial, junior midfielder Helped the Patriots to a 6A state runner-up finish 52 goals, 52 assists USA Field Hockey U17 National team member All-Coastal Conference first team Committed to Duke Read more about Schleicher ____
Caroline Arrowood , Hickory, senior defender
All-PenSouth Conference first team, All-5A South Region second team 15 goals, 10 assists Committed to William and Mary ____
Alex Brewer , Cox, junior forward
All-Coastal Conference first team Helped the Falcons win a record 18th state championship 22 goals, five assists ____
Courtney Byler , Norfolk Academy, senior defender
All-Tidewater Conference and All-VISAA Division I player of the year Helped the Bulldogs win the VISAA Division I state title 15 goals, 16 assists Committed to Davidson ____
Courtney Daniels , Cox, senior midfielder
All-Coastal Conference first team Helped the Falcons with a record 18th state championship Nine goals, nine assists Committed to Ohio State ____
Lacey Frazier , Princess Anne, junior goalkeeper
All-Atlantic Conference first team, All-5A South Region first team Helped the Cavaliers win the 5A state championship 17 shutouts while allowing only 10 goals in 24 games ____
Emma Haupt , Cox, senior midfielder
All-Coastal Conference Player of the Year Helped the Falcons with a record 18th state championship 17 goals, 11 assists ____
Sara Margaret Kelly, Princess Anne, senior defender
All-Atlantic Conference first team, All-5A South Region second team Helped the Cavaliers win the 5A state championship ____
Kristin Kisa , Princess Anne, senior forward
All-Atlantic Conference Player of the Year, All-5A South Region first team Helped the Cavaliers win the 5A state championship 24 goals, 18 assists Committed to Davidson ____
Marlee McClendon , First Colonial, junior defender
All-Coastal Conference first team Helped the Patriots to a 6A state runner-up finish 16 assists ____
Erin Scherrer , Cape Henry, senior midfielder
All-Tidewater Conference first team, All-VISAA Division I first team Three-time All-Tidewater first-teamer USA Field Hockey U19 National team 13 goals, 10 assists Committed to Duke ____
Talia Tapper , Kellam, junior forward
All-Atlantic Conference first team, All-5A South Region first team Seven goals, nine assists
____
SECOND TEAM
Hannah Fox , Maury, senior defender
Riley Fulmer , Norfolk Academy, freshman forward
Greer Gill , Norfolk Academy, freshman midfielder
Nealy Henderson , Bishop Sullivan, senior midfielder
Jackie Kisa , Princess Anne, senior defender
Kerrie Lightfoot , Hickory, senior defender
Elizabeth McClaugherty , Hickory, senior defender
Lauren Miller , First Colonial, senior midfielder
Ashleigh Nottingham , Maury, senior midfielder
Suzie Pileckas , Cox, senior goal keeper
McKinzie Tomes , Grassfield, sophomore forward
